issue.title: [CF 549] Tell me When - Cant track Shadow Orbs at all in 5.0.4?
issue.body:
Cant track Shadow Orbs at all in 5.0.4, no matter what settings I do, please help. It all worked perfectly before patch with the previous version, now I upgraded to the last version of TMW and nothing. Every other thing works in TMW ( I can track other things), but not shadow orbs.

Can you please help ?

Hope to hear you soon.


> Posted by CurseForge user ssishtar | Imported from CurseForge issue #549 | Raw

comments.body:
Deleted your comment on Curse to keep things in one place.

Could you please post the export string of the icon that should be tracking your shadow orbs?

To get an export string, open the icon editor, and click on the arrow next to the editbox labeled "Import/Export/Backup". Select the "To string" option for the appropriate export type (icon, group, or profile), and then press CTRL+C to copy it to your clipboard.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Before you trouble yourself with that, though, I just want to make sure that you are trying to track shadow orbs with a condition.

Shadow orbs aren't a buff anymore. They are a resource, and must be tracked with the Shadow Orbs condition, found in the Resources category in the condition panel.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

You may also find this useful:

http://wow.curseforge.com/addons/tellmewhen/forum/priest/42205-shadow-track-number-of-shadow-orbs/
